item.title: 从学数学到做数据科学：一个普通学生的学习路
item.description:
从UCSB学数学到现在做数据科学，记录一下这几年的学习经历和踩过的坑。

Phase I: The Mathematical Foundation (2020-2022)
#

My intellectual journey began with pure mathematics at UCSB, where I was captivated by the elegance of mathematical proofs and the logical architecture of abstract concepts. Real analysis taught me rigor, linear algebra revealed the power of dimensionality, and discrete mathematics showed me how to think combinatorially. But more than specific techniques, mathematics gave me something invaluable: the ability to see patterns, construct logical arguments, and never accept “it just works” as an answer.
